# About Me

I'm Paweł Białas, a Master's student at Department of Demography at University of Vienna.

My research focuses on general demographic changes in the population. I've worked on a wide arrange of topics from the fertility in Balkans, mortality in Eastern Europe and mobility as a consequence of environmental changes.

## Research Interests

-   Demographic change
-   Mortality
-   Migration

## Education

-   BSc in Quantitative methods in economics, Warsaw School of Economics
